Name: Elegante Margarita
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge & salt rim (optional).
Review: One of the best Margarita recipes around. Richly endowed with flavour.
History: Created in 1999 by Robert Plotkin and Raymon Flores of BarMedia, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Elegante Margarita contains 173 calories
